strategy: Tau armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: XV8 Crisis Battlesuit, XV10 Heavy Battlesuit Cadres and KV128 Stormsurge and KX139 Supremacy Armour have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Vior'la Military world of the Tau Empire

formations.name: Heavy Battlesuit Cadre
formations.units: Three XV104 Riptide Battlesuits, three XV107 R'Varna Battlesuits or three XV109 Y'Vahra Battlesuits

sections.name: Vior'la Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two for each Vior'la Core Formation taken

formations.name: Fire Warrior Strike Group
formations.units: Eight Fire Warriors, or six Fire Warriors and three Devilfish

formations.name: Drone Group
formations.units: Six Gun Drones or six Missile Drones
extraUnits: Replace two Gun Drones or two Missile Drones with two Marker Drones or two Shield Drones: 25 points

formations.name: Recon Skimmer Group
formations.units: Any six of the following units: Piranha, Tetra

formations.name: Stealth Group
extraUnits: Replace up to three XV15 Stealth Battlesuits with XV95 Ghostkeel Battlesuits

sections.name: Vior'la War Engines & Air Caste Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.
